text: Créteil is a city in the southeast suburb of Paris, France. It is the prefecture of the Val-de-Marne department in the Île-de-France region. ==Twin towns== Créteil is twinned with: * Falkirk, Scotland * Kiryat Yam, Israel * Salzgitter, Germany * Les Abymes, France * Mataró, Spain * Bejaia, Algeria Category:Communes in Val-de-Marne Category:Departmental capitals in France
title: Créteil
